RxML.TEXT: <gender>Female</gender> <age>19-24</age> <treatment_length>less than 1 month</treatment_length> <satisfaction>4</satisfaction> <effectiveness>4</effectiveness> <condition>Condition: Painful Periods</condition> <comment>So far I haven't had any nausea which I usually get from birth control and no hair loss or acne as other people have been complaining about. The only problem is that if I forget to take it at the same time every day I get spotting but I've only been on it for 2 weeks so we'll see how it goes. And my sex drive has actually gone up!</comment>

SIDE_EFFECT.text: sex drive has actually gone up

CAUSE.text: forget to take it at the same time every day
